metadata.description: In answer to a distress call, Kerra returns to her Sith-controlled homeworldfor a daring rescue, but her arrival on the planet coincides with an ambush from a Hutt mastermind! The clash with his invasion and a number of other unexpected surprises place Kerra’s small-scale rescue into a hot spot. She has to troubleshoot fast, and, as always, alone!
metadata.name: Star Wars: Knight Errant - Deluge
